reapack.name: bertbouwhuis_MIDI controller for S8 looper with fade in and out.jsfx
reapack.desc: MIDI controller for S8 looper with fade in and out

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: Decrease maximum visible range of beats sliders to 8 beats (was 255) Fix embarrassingly wrong calculation of beats to seconds Improve behavior when the minimum beats slider > maximum beats and vice versa

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: Fix handling of notes active on more than one channel simultaneously

version.author: cfillion
version.changelog: Fix handling of MIDI note #128 Fix note off events always being sent to channel 1

version.author: Matt Horn
version.changelog: - Added "Next Pattern" for better automation of pattern switching

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: Improved Graphics Add FX chain file for voice doubling

metadata.description:
{\rtf1\ansi\deff0{\fonttbl{\f0 \fswiss Helvetica;}{\f1 Courier;}} {\colortbl;\red255\green0\blue0;\red0\green0\blue255;} \widowctrl\hyphauto
{\pard \ql \f0 \sa180 \li0 \fi0 \b \fs32 Description\par} {\pard \ql \f0 \sa180 \li0 \fi0 \f1 This plugin combines the multiple channels in an MPE Midi stream to a single channel to allow for feeding a single polyphonic or monophonic instrument.\line \line All incoming midi messages are routed to a single channel.\line \line Up to three realtime control messages are modified on the fly. All other messages are not modified. Each of the three message types can be chosen to be either of a CC message with a defined number, Pitch Wheel, or Channel Pressure.\line For each of the three, the incoming values are monitored and the current state is stored according to the input channel, i.e. for any keys simultaneously pressed on an MPE aware keyboard. \line In order to create a consistent value for the non-MPE-aware instrument to be played, appropriate modified messages for these control values are generated any time either such a control value change message is received or a Note-On or Note-Off message is received. \line This message will denote either the last received value ("current", which in effect provides no change to that value), or a combination of the just received message and current values of all channels that currently hold a running sound, according to the previous Note-On and Note-Off messages. \line \line In "Polyphonic" mode, this combination will be computed as either of the minimum, the average, the maximum, the sum or the value of the latest key pressed. Hence the played polyphonic sound will be provided with more reasonable control values than just adhering to the latest value present on any of the MPE channels. \line \line In "Monophonic" mode, the three selected realtime control messages are never modified, but blocked while two or more channels provide a running sound. This allows for rather normal behavior of instruments that detect legato note transitions and trills. \line \line Optionally the modes can be set to handle all channels equally or to use channel 1 as a global channel. In global mode, note on/off events on channel 1 are ignored and blocked, and all other events are passed thiought to the otput channel. \line \line The "Smoothing" fader defines the time span a new value will need to be reached in case multiple keys are running. If the current value had been the result of at max one pressed key, the new value is sent out immediately. \line \line The "Bypass" option does the obvious.\par} {\pard \ql \f0 \sa180 \li0 \fi0 \b \fs32 Graph\par} {\pard \ql \f0 \sa180 \li0 \fi0 \f1 A graph shows the currently "running" channels and the saved values of the three managed realtime controls. The last burt one line shows the values to be sent out when smoothiong is finished. The last line shows the last value sent out, proceeded by a star as long as smoothing is running on that value.\line Moreover the first number in the last but one line denotes that one of the following states has been encountered since the last start: 1: a Note On has been detected on an already running channel. 2: a Note Off has been detected on a not running channel. 4: two running channel at the same time in "Monophonic" mode, resulting in blocking realtime messages. The second number shows the number of currently "running" channels.\par} }

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: improved handling of Midi offset, "latest key" mode, bugfixes

reapack.name: mschnell_Note On under X velocity to Note Off and send All Notes Off.jsfx
reapack.desc: Note On under X velocity to Note Off and send All Notes Off

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: allow for setting vel = 0 -> pass through

version.author: polgo
version.changelog: Integer conversion pushed to end for more precise factoring

version.author: Talagan
version.changelog: Added theme system, with two themes, Dark and Light. Reworked contrasts on Dark Theme. Bug fix : red curve feedback circle was a bit shifted if the CC was set to High Res.

version.author: Talagan
version.changelog: Fix : HighRes midi velocity was not properly handled for MSB 1, LSB 0. Fix : Highres midi velocity LSB was not sent on the proper CC (#88). Added a "pen" button to trigger pen mode, to avoid accidental clicks on the curve Added channel routing options for notes and ccs. Added firewall option for unrouted notes. Since red keys may now be kept due to channel re-routing, added an option to select what keys are transposed (All/Green/Red) Since red keys may now be kept due to channel re-routing, added an option to select what keys are affected by the velocity control (All/Green/Red) Added curve mih/max behaviours : the user can now set some min/max limits on the curve, so that the curve is clamped between those bounds. Predefined curves will be adapted to that range and pen drawing will be restricted to that range too. And a bit of source code cleaning.

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: Stops latch mode sending unnecessary note-ons

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Renamed to MIDI Performer2 because presets will not be compatible - too many changes under the hood - Variable no. of rows - up to 32 rows - Rows can be always enabled (∀) - Program Changes can be sent on preset load and Row # change (edit @init to enable PC by default & on project load) - Add output monitor - Generate 6 CCs per row (edit @init to change which CCs) - Reshuffle columns (out is now last) - Fixed Touchpad value scrolling - Automation: Sliders update to top 4 selected rows

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: Range all sliders from 0 to gain compatibility with ReaLearn relative mode (Transpose, Out Channel and Max Note sliders now work)

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Add note monitor - More accurate monitoring - Send CC's when all rows are enabled - CC's default to 64

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Split multiple keyzones to lanes instead of overlapping - Right Click on number sliders to revert to default value (draggable) - Add hanging prevention to input parameters (## is now the only parameter that will leave notes hanging)

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Fix sending sporadic random midi messages when row count (##) is high - slightly improve logic regarding bank/PC getting sent

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Fix note-offs getting through from the wrong MIDI bus

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Fix for transpose sometimes causing hanging notes

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Fix for transpose passing to subsequent zones

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Add Program Change input support - Colour note zone sliders to match note zones

version.author: Kevin Morrison (ThrashJazzAssassin)
version.changelog: - Add Program Change on/off toggle per row - Recolour note zones to always be red-green-blue-repeat

reapack.name: willdevelop_MIDI Note Repeater [Default Key Map B1 - A4].jsfx
reapack.desc: MIDI Note Repeater [Default Key Map B1 - A4]

version.author: Xeewaj Q.
version.changelog: Notes are displayed only for "note on" events.

version.author: Xeewaj Q.
version.changelog: New options: time shift, velocity/timing deviation direction.

version.author: Xeewaj Q.
version.changelog: Precise beats option, beat detection corrections.

version.author: Xeewaj Q.
version.changelog: Fixed duplicate notes under some circumstances.

version.author: brumbear
version.changelog: Added Features - Continuous Loop Length Change Slider. Map this one to a rotary encoder in relative mode. When used the loop length transitions will happen immediately while repeat mode is on. When repeat mode switches back to off the plugin automatically goes back to stepped mode.

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: bug fixes, added graphics for fun and to start to gain compatibility with ReaRack

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: + improved keyboard (priority to last or highest note) + added tremolo + added ModWheel/Aftertouch vibrato depth + added Pitch bend +- 1 octave + modified Seq gains can be negative (opposite phase) + modified Seq. init to fundamental seq

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: # Note off bug corrected + improved keyboard (priority to last or highest note) + added tremolo + added ModWheel/Aftertouch vibrato depth + added Pitch bend +- 1 octave + modified Seq gains can be negative (opposite phase) + modified Seq. init to fundamental seq

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: + ADSR enveloppe + Selectable velocity curve # Brilliance and Character + modwheel Vibrato depth + After touch sensitive Vibrato speed + Pitch bend +-1 octave + Tremulant rate (detune between operators) + phase modulation synthesis (3 operators per note) + Per note index limitation (anti aliasing)

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: # note off bug + ADSR enveloppe + Selectable velocity curve # Brilliance and Character + modwheel Vibrato depth + After touch sensitive Vibrato speed + Pitch bend +-1 octave + Tremulant rate (detune between operators) + phase modulation synthesis (3 operators per note) + Per note index limitation (anti aliasing)

version.author: T.Rochebois
version.changelog: version 1.2 # 4 New "Characters": Bell, Reed, Harmonica and Nasillard. + Velocity sensitive atteck time + MIDI control of A D S R Brilliance and Character (CC 73 75 76 72 74 and 71) + All notes off on play_state != 1 && play_state != 5 + All notes off on "All Sounds Off" (CC 120) version 1.1 # Off gate -20dB than before version 1.02 + ADSR enveloppe + Selectable velocity curve # Brilliance and Character + modwheel Vibrato depth + After touch sensitive Vibrato speed + Pitch bend +-1 octave + Tremulant rate (detune between operators) + phase modulation synthesis (3 operators per note) + Per note index limitation (anti aliasing)

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: See separate changelogs in each module

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: See separate changelogs in each module

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: See separate changelogs in each module

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: See separate changelogs in each module

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Bug fix for Additive Oscillator, the master/slave function was not working, now fixed.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Various bug fixes for LFO 2 frequency modulation function.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Bug fixes for LFO 2, trapezoidal oscillator and additive oscillator.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.0.1 - 16/01/2018 Added Moog Filter module. Version 2.0.0 - 12/12/2017 All modules updated to version 2.0.0.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.0.2 - 17/01/2018 Moog Filter module zipper noised fixed. Version 2.0.1 - 16/01/2018 Added Moog Filter module. Version 2.0.0 - 12/12/2017 All modules updated to version 2.0.0.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.1.0 - 14/02/2018 Added MIDI Nonlinearizer module. Added latch trigger mode to envelope generator. Fixed a bug in envelope generator which prevented legato trigger modes from working. 15 modules updated to improve CC encoding/decoding accuracy (bug led to CC vales of 128 being output occasionally). Fixed a bug in CC Mixer module (wrong output channel).

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.2.0 - 21/02/2018 Important - Fixed a bug in CC Mixer module (no output). Features added - Oscillators (except Noise) and KS Delay now respond to MIDI pitch bend messages for pitch control. Pitch bend and pitch modulation by CC can be summed together. Oscillators have an additional 'Master pitch modulation range' slider.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.2.1 - 25/02/2018 Updated the Poly Splitter module to accept note-on with velocity = 0 as note-off.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.3.0 - 25/07/2018 Added Envelope Multi-Tool & MIDI Mixer. Updated Non Lineraizer and Amplifier. Deleted CC Mixer.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.3.2 - 05/08/2018 Envelope Multi-Tool, changed Sustain Level control to Stage End Point Level control.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.3.3 - 01/09/2018 Improved Amlifier module. Minor graphics bug fix for MIDI Mixer module

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Version 2.3.4 - 01/09/2018 Envelope Multi-Tool bug fix, stage 1 bezier curve was functioning incorrectly.

version.author: Malcolm Smith
version.changelog: Bug Fixes in Envelope Multi-Tool and Additive and Trapezoidal oscilators.

version.author: Corey Scogin
version.changelog: Removed the linear to dB conversions. All attenuation values calculated directly now. Clear the buffer when the window changes. Keeping old buffer values would result in unexpected behavior. Added the freembuf call to indicate how much memory is used.

version.author: Corey Scogin
version.changelog: Improved plugin bypass behavior. Instance count now resets on stop/play.

version.author: Corey Scogin
version.changelog: More instance count tracking improvements. Now supports jumping playback position while playing.

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: add temperature slider and display in cm

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: added "all" input channel and "same as received" output channel setting, added Note On/Off Velocity and Pitch Bend as input source, pass through now optional, bugfixes

version.author: mschnell
version.changelog: allow for bank no > 7 Explicitly disallow more than 1024 patch names (due to limitation of JSFX/EEL) Bug fixes

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: Added Muting Notification CC value slider

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: Added Muting Notification CC value slider

version.author: Michael Schnell (mschnell@bschnell.de)
version.changelog: workaround for freezing when Reaper looses the GUI focus, deterministic volume normalizing

reapack.desc: single fader to trim 32-channels by same amount

reapack.desc: Faders to trim 32-channels by same amount in stereo pairs
